name: Moki Mobility
overview:
MokiMobility was founded on the vision that mobile devices are and will continue to shape the way consumers and businesses connect with each other. Using next generation web and mobile technologies, including antive apps, HTML 5 and large scale cloud platforms, MokiMobility is building a platform and solutions that will enable more customers and businesses to engage, share and interact.

The management team at MokiMobility has been producing mission critical web and mobility solutions for customers for more than 12 years. Past projects, including 10 years producing SaaS oriented web solutions for the events industry as founders at WingateWeb, have given the team experience producing and managing time critical, scalable solutions. Through the years, our customer list has included large and small businesses with a few notables being Cisco, Hewlett Packard, Visa, VMware, EMC and Noell. Our experience in building web sites and applications used by millions of customers, including online payment solutions that have transacted more than $100M (and counting), and collaboration sites that are critical to dozens of Fortune 500 customers, gives us the depth of experience and knowledge to assist MokiMobility’s customers with their needs. MokiMobility is based in Utah, at the base of the Wasatch Mountains. Our team is comprised of skilled and seasoned software engineers and technology innovators.
